segments.text: I notice a boy trying to reach into the cookie jar, and my heart races a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a two-step stool that looks ready to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a sense of dread as I watch him stretch his body.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely engaged in the moment, caught up in this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what if he falls? What if he lands right in that puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a risky endeavor, and I feel like yelling out to warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
